faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What documents do business owners need to register a UAQ FTZ company?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of UAE entry stamps, passport-sized photos, and recent utility bills for address proof.

items.question: Do businesses have to pay in the Umm al Quwain free zone?
items.answer: With new regulations, businesses in UAQ free zone now enjoy 0% corporate and personal taxes and low import/expert duties.

items.question: What business activities can I engage in Umm Al Quwain’s free zones??
items.answer: The region offers a diverse range of over 1,500 business activities tailored to your unique needs.

items.question: Do I need to secure a physical office to register in UAQ FTZ?
items.answer: No! You can set up your business in UAQ free zone using cost-effective alternatives like flexi-desk or co-sharing offices.

items.question: Can I bundle multiple business activities under a single UAQ free zone license?
items.answer: Yes, you can consolidate numerous activities under a single trade license. For instance, commercial licenses allow for ten categories, whereas freelancer permits can accommodate up to two activities.
